hackathon-description-text: Only 400K people can visit the Web unrestricted, whereas 2,6M can only send and receive emails. We built
hackathon-rules: No especific rules. Just behave naturaly, come dress confortable, be ready to hack and have a lot of fun.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=7757 W Flagler St #220, Miami, FL 33144, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the application polished, visually appealing, and easy to use?
Can the solution be applied in low bandwidth territories?
Is the application compelling and/or indispensable? How many people will be affected by its usage.
How well does the application carries our mission of offering free internet in Cuba?
Would the concept work long-term? For how long would Cubans benefit from its usage?
Does the application take advantage of the unique functionality offered by the platform?

hackathon-location-address: 7757 W Flagler St #220, Miami, FL 33144, USA
hackathon-description-header: Let's connect Cuba to the internet
hackathon-location-description: Florida Vocational Institute at Mall of the Americas
